trans-unit.source: Represents the base functionality for all menus.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la funzionalità di base per tutti i menu.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref> replace and add functionality to the Menu control of previous versions, Menu is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"> </xref> sostituire e aggiungere funzionalità al controllo Menu delle versioni precedenti, Menu viene mantenuto per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti e un utilizzo futuro, se si sceglie.

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe è la classe base per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>classi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un'istanza di questa classe.

trans-unit.source: The menus for an application consist of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: I menu per un'applicazione sono costituiti da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: These can contain other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects, representing submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Questi possono contenere altri <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti, che rappresentano le voci di sottomenu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects can be stored in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> for display as an entire menu structure for a form or a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that is used to display shortcut menus.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti possono essere archiviati in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>per la visualizzazione come un'intera struttura di menu per un form o un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>che viene utilizzato per visualizzare il menu di scelta rapida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This class provides functionality that is common for all the menu classes.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe fornisce funzionalità comuni per tutte le classi di menu.

trans-unit.source: Unlike many base classes, the Menu class uses its derived classes to define many of its properties.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di molte classi di base, la classe Menu utilizza le classi derivate per definire molte delle relative proprietà.

trans-unit.source: If you are using your menu in a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A> property to specify a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> that displays a list of open MDI child forms in your application.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza il menu in un'applicazione con interfaccia a documenti multipli (MDI), è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A>proprietà per specificare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>che visualizza un elenco di form figlio MDI aperti nell'applicazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MdiListItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property contains a list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects stored in the menu class.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà contiene un elenco di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti archiviati in una classe di menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, this property contains all the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Per un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, questa proprietà contiene tutte le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti visualizzati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property represents the submenu items associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Per un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà rappresenta le voci di sottomenu associate.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties that are provided for all the derived menu classes, the Menu class also provides methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, that enable you to create new menus from existing menus, and also merge two menu structures together.
trans-unit.target: Oltre alle proprietà che vengono fornite per tutte le classi derivate di menu, la classe Menu fornisce inoltre metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A>, che consentono di creare nuovi menu da menu esistenti e anche di strutture di unire due menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MergeMenu%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.CloneMenu%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Menu class also defines the nested class <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: La classe di Menu definisce inoltre la classe annidata <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: This class defines the collection of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe definisce la raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti utilizzati dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use the methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection> class to add and remove menu items from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare i metodi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>classe per aggiungere e rimuovere le voci di menu da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Since <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is an abstract class, only inherited classes can call the Menu constructor.
trans-unit.target: Poiché <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>è una classe astratta, solo le classi ereditate possono chiamare il costruttore del Menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> containing the objects to add to the menu.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> contenente gli oggetti da aggiungere al menu.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> that is passed as a parameter to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Copie di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> che viene passato come parametro all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method copies the entire list of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects (stored in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> passed in to `menuSrc`) into the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo copia l'intero elenco di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti (archiviati nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>passato a `menuSrc`) nel menu corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this method in your derived class to clone <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo nella classe derivata da clonare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: They can then be reused by other classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Possono essere riutilizzati da altre classi che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> to copy.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> da copiare.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new handle to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo handle per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the menu if the method succeeds; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un handle per il menu se il metodo ha esito positivo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Disposes of the resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Elimina le risorse, tranne la memoria, usate per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>in modo che la memoria occupata può essere recuperata tramite garbage collection.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> object's destructor.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>non è verranno liberate finché garbage collection di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>distruttore dell'oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*> method should search for a handle.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>metodo deve eseguire la ricerca per un handle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that contains the value specified.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> che contiene il valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a handle, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> field as the type, and the handle of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Per cercare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>utilizzando un handle, passare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle>campo come tipo e l'handle del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>si desidera trovare come valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindHandle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To search for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> using a shortcut, pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> field as the type, and the Shortcut value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> you want to find as the value.
trans-unit.target: Per cercare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>utilizzando un collegamento, passare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut>campo come tipo e il valore di scelta rapida per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>si desidera trovare come valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindShortcut> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The type of item to use to find the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di elemento da utilizzare per trovare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The item to use to find the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento da utilizzare per trovare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that matches value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> che corrisponde al valore; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione in cui deve essere inserita una voce di menu nel menu.

trans-unit.source: The merge order of a menu item specifies the relative position that this menu item will assume if the menu structure that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> is contained in is merged with another.
trans-unit.target: Ordine di unione di una voce di menu specifica la posizione relativa che questa voce di menu assumerà se la struttura di menu che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>contenuto viene unita a un altro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The merge order position for the menu item to be merged.
trans-unit.target: La posizione nell'ordine di merge per la voce di menu da unire.

trans-unit.source: The position at which a menu item should be inserted into the menu.
trans-unit.target: La posizione in cui deve essere inserita una voce di menu nel menu.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*> method should search for a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>metodo deve eseguire la ricerca di un collegamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.FindMenuItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> che contiene questo menu.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> that this menu is contained in.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di ottenere un riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>cui questo menu viene indipendente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce `null` se il menu non è contenuto in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può verificarsi se il menu è contenuto in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>, o se il menu non è contenuto in alcun menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare se un menu è attualmente in uso, nonché per determinare la posizione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu"> </xref> che contiene questo menu.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> che contiene questo menu.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to obtain a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> this menu is currently located in.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di ottenere un riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>questo menu è attualmente posizionato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `null` if the menu is not contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà restituisce `null` se il menu non è contenuto in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the menu is contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, or if the menu is not contained in any menu.
trans-unit.target: Ciò può verificarsi se il menu è contenuto in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>, o se il menu non è contenuto in alcun menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a menu is currently being used, and also to determine where.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare se un menu è attualmente in uso, nonché per determinare la posizione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"></xref> that contains this menu.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu"> </xref> che contiene questo menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the window handle for the menu.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta l'handle di finestra per il menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain the handle to the menu to perform special operations to the menu outside of the functionality provided by this class or its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per ottenere l'handle per il menu per eseguire operazioni speciali al menu oltre le funzionalità fornite da questa classe o le relative classi derivate.

trans-unit.source: The HMENU value of the menu.
trans-unit.target: Il valore HMENU del menu.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this menu contains any menu items.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questo menu contiene voci di menu.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: You can use this method to determine whether any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are assigned to this menu.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo metodo per determinare se eventuali <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti vengono assegnati a questo menu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to checking for `null` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ciò equivale a selezionare per `null` nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this menu contains <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questo menu contiene <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> oggetti; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that is used to display a list of multiple document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> utilizzato per visualizzare un elenco di form figlio MDI (interfaccia) a documenti multipli.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> has been specified to display the list of open child windows in an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>è stato specificato per visualizzare l'elenco di finestre figlie in un'applicazione MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: To use a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> as an MDI list, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> to be used.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare un oggetto specifico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>come elenco MDI, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A>proprietà la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>da utilizzare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MdiList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item displaying a list of MDI child forms that are open in the application.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> che rappresenta la voce di menu Visualizza un elenco di form figlio MDI aperti nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects associated with the menu.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica la raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> oggetti associati al menu.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to obtain a reference to the list of menu items that are currently stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà per ottenere un riferimento all'elenco di voci di menu che sono attualmente archiviati nel menu.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> objects, the MenuItems property contains the entire menu structure in the control.
trans-unit.target: Per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>oggetti, la proprietà MenuItems contiene l'intera struttura di menu nel controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> class, the MenuItems property contains the list of submenu items associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: Per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>che classe, la proprietà MenuItems contiene l'elenco di voci di sottomenu associati <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: With the reference to the collection of menu items for the menu (provided by this property), you can add and remove menu items, determine the total number of menu items, and clear the list of menu items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Con il riferimento alla raccolta di voci di menu per il menu (fornito da questa proprietà), è possibile aggiungere e rimuovere voci di menu, determinare il numero totale di voci di menu e cancellare l'elenco di voci di menu dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: For more information on maintaining the menu item collection for a menu, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> documentation.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione di raccolta di elementi di menu per un menu, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName>documentazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the list of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects stored in the menu.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItemCollection?displayProperty=fullName> che rappresenta l'elenco di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> gli oggetti archiviati nel menu.

trans-unit.source: Merges the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"></xref> objects of one menu with the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Unisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem"> </xref> oggetti di un menu con menu corrente.

trans-unit.source: This method merges <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects from one menu with the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo unisce <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti di un menu con menu corrente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects are merged according to the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>gli oggetti vengono uniti in base ai valori di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeOrder%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeType%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Menu merging is typically done to merge the menus of a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent form with those of its active MDI child form.
trans-unit.target: Unione di menu viene in genere eseguita per unire i menu di un form padre Multiple Document Interface (MDI) con quelli del form figlio MDI attivo.

trans-unit.source: This is performed automatically by the .NET Framework common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguita automaticamente da common language runtime di .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For example, if an MDI parent form contains a set of menus for handling files and your MDI child form also has file-related menu items, the menu sets will automatically merge into a single file menu set when the child form is displayed in the MDI parent form.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se un form padre MDI contiene un set di menu per la gestione dei file e il form figlio MDI contiene voci di menu relativo al file, i gruppi di menu, unirà automaticamente in un menu singolo file impostato quando il form figlio viene visualizzato nel form padre MDI.

trans-unit.source: You can use the MergeMenu method if you are merging two menu structures that are not part of an MDI application.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il metodo MergeMenu se si uniscono due strutture di menu che non fanno parte di un'applicazione MDI.

trans-unit.source: This implementation can be called by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> classes to merge two or more objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione può essere chiamata da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu>classi</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenu> o per unire due o più oggetti che derivano da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: To merge two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem> objects use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per unire due <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>utilizzano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem.MergeMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> whose menu items are merged with the menu items of the current menu.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> cui voci di menu vengono unite con le voci di menu corrente.

trans-unit.source: It was attempted to merge the menu with itself.
trans-unit.target: Si è tentato di unire il menu con se stesso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: At design time, this property is set to the programmatic identifier of the control.
trans-unit.target: In fase di progettazione, questa proprietà è impostata sull'identificatore del controllo a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: However, this property has no bearing on the control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, questa proprietà non è rilevante per il controllo in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta il nome.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto di comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passato per riferimento che rappresenta il messaggio della finestra da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valori che rappresenta il tasto da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il carattere è stato elaborato dal controllo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets user-defined data associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta dati definiti dall'utente associati al controllo.

trans-unit.source: An object representing the data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che rappresenta i dati.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref> controllo.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a <xref:System.String> that includes the type and the number of items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo ToString restituisce un <xref:System.String>che include il tipo e il numero di elementi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A>proprietà del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Menu.MenuItems%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Menu"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
